Articles.Content: For the life if me I can not figure out action keys for ps5. I think inset it up in the editor but how do it know its activated and what button activate it? It's not in the radial menu.

First press the arrow that points right. This will open up a wheel with all your action groups (1-10) and you can use the left joystick to select a group by pointing at one action group and pressing X once it's highlighted. Hope I helped!

Edited May 28 by RealJebediahKerman
typo
